name: This Way Up (AndreFremaux)
description:
This Way Up [An abandoned prototype] About

This Way Up is an old prototype I made in 2019 and stopped working on due to other commitments.
Minor edits have been made to get this to an acceptable state to publish.

The original idea was that you play as a robot stuck inside a package and must escape a shipping and receiving warehouse.
There are only 4 basic levels in this prototype.

Controls Left / Right ArrowsMoveSpace barFire Grappling Hook
